comment.author: 99646216@N00
comment._content: I love the contrast between the very serious, formal face and pearls, and the riot of flowers and (presumably) colour below. That's quite the flamboyant outfit.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/hockadilly] Wonder if this was her outfit for a ball or pre-Christmas Dinner Dance?
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Perhaps she was a member of the Tramore naturist colony who had to cover up for the photograph?  Apart from the rather grim expression she does look well as does the shawl/dress!

comment._content: What a beautiful photograph of a beautiful and, I suspect, very complex woman.
